content.detailedDescription:
I walked out my back door saw 2 bright objects to the south east hovering over downtown binghamton, when i walked out more to get a better look i noticed there wre more, at least 4 maybe 5 bright orange objects.
 as the clouds became thicker they started vanishing, before they were gone i saw on of the objects move from left right approaching one of the other lights, then one by one they all just vanished, the entire thing only lasted a few minutes and i had 3 witnesses with me at the time. i attempted to get video but it was too dark for my camera to see them.
content.summary: I walked out my back door saw 2 bright objects to the south east hovering over downtown binghamton, when i walked out more to get a better look i noticed there wre more, at least 4 maybe 5 bright orange objects

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were out in backyard smoking when he noticed a bright light in the sky coming from the south that he thought was a slow shooting star. we both watched come from the south, then come over our heads then head north. slowed down a little then sped up a little bit. no blinking lights at all. the light stayed the same even after it went well to the north. you could see the light for miles from both directions. was weird no blinking, no different colored lights. did not change directions though. it did change speeds but continued to fly straight. there was no noise at all from the object.
content.summary: Brother and i saw a light in sky that did not blink

content.detailedDescription: I was on a us air flight 2646 from austin texas to charlotte nc arriving around 3 pm in afternoon on april 5th. as we made final descent to charlotte mcdouglas airport , i was looking out my window when i observed a unusual object that caught my eye . we where roughly 200 feet from the ground when incident occurred. i was looking down at the cars on streets and people in their yards when a fast moving cigar shape object that appeared to be 6-10 ft in length flew past the plane going the opposite direction that the plane was traveling . like it was leaving the airport and passing us. the object was between the plane and the tree tops, so i was looking down on it at a 45 degree angle. it appeared to be cigar shape with greyish dark dull exterior tapering slightly toward the ends of it .I followed it with my eyes with my fore head pressed against the window , i strained to see it as it disappeared out of view to the rear of the aircraft and was eventually blocked by the depth of the plane window. it appeard to be moving very fast and i tracked it only a couple of seconds before it zipped out of view. even though the object was traveling in a straight horizontal path it seemed to begin to ascend a short distance after it passed the rear of the plane. i am a non believer in these sort of matters. i only report this out of curiosity of what it was i saw. i thought maby a balloon used for air direction , but i saw no visible teathers on the object and i  thought wind indicators would have bright colors to make them visible to pilots. this was dull color and moving at fast rate of speed. i googled such balloons but found nothing like what i saw.  i thought if it was a toy floating then flying it near landing planes would be dangerous to the airplane. there were no exterior features like fins or markings. i waited til my trip was over to reflect and finally write what i saw. curious if it could have been a every day item that i mistook for a strange object. perhaps a pilot or some one who lives in the neighborhoods near charlotte airport could explain what it was a saw.
content.summary: 6-10ft long cigar shape cylindrical object with greyish dull surface

content.detailedDescription:
1. about 10 miles from a small town called hartsell,co.. i was driving to base camp for an elk hunt. this was about 1:30 a.M. with no moon, just pitch black night.

2. the object just appeared to my right front n.W. of my location. the area is open terrain little to no trees or buildings.

3. i was not sure?  what i was sure of was it did not belong there. we are talking about prairie a lot of open space.


4. the object was round, stationary, bright white, made no sound, there were no rays coming from the light, was not on the ground and a small black dot appeared in the center of the light. the black dot grew from the center out word to the outer rim then it was gone. it did not move, it was just gone. i do not know of any man made light that turns off from the center out word.

5. this not being the first object i have seen over the years i was just in wonderment over the hole thing. i watch the object for about thirty or forty
seconds while i continued to drive west. 

6. the object disappeared as fast as it appeared. it winked in then winked out.
content.summary: Bright white light appeared with no rays coming off it.

content.detailedDescription:
After witnessing a large disk shaped object in the sky some months ago i have made it a point to look up in the sky when i go outside.  last night i was outside enjoying the pleasant temperatures and the clear night sky.  i observed what i assumed was an airplane crossing over the sky heading generally from north to south.  as i watched it i noticed that it was a single, very bright, white light, with no strobes.  i didn't think anything about it till it turned and went vertical up into the sky.  it went very fast and was so high in 4 or 5 seconds that it was completely gone and out of sight.  

from what i could tell i would guess that the light was at about 10,000 feet when i first saw it.  it changed directions, verticle and very rapidly went up.  my best guess is that the light faded out at say, 60 to 80,000 feet.  it made no sound at all.  

i was completely shocked when i saw this and had to think about it for a moment to reason out if i had just seen what i thought i had seen.  this occured in the northern guilford county area but, was so high from the ground i can't say for sure.  

i watched the sky for a while to see if i could observe any trace of the craft or any sign that it was some other occurence.  all i saw was that in a short period of time two airplanes crossed paths in the exact spot where i saw the light go vertical.  i was going to ignore it but, decided to report it here as it might be useful to someone.
content.summary: Changed direction from horizontal to straight verticle.

content.detailedDescription:
I just kind of look around when i drive and i just saw it.  five extremely bright lights in a horizontal  row very big only saw them for a second or a second and a half.  i could not pull over because i was in my car.  when i went down a side street the trees were to tall and i could not find it.  

i would like to know if anyone else in the area saw this as well.  i just can't believe no one else saw it and i would really like to know what you find out.  i would estimate from first light to the last light it has to be hundreds of feet long because it was over a mile away.  

i couldn't believe what i was seeing.
content.summary: Five extremely bright lights in a row very big only saw for a second or second and a half

content.detailedDescription: I was going back into the house after taking my dog for a potty break.  i have been studying the stars with the help of my i pad. looking up one last time the stars were blinking out and coming back on. at first i thought tree branches were getting in the way,but realized there were no branches there. i could see no object . i carry a 2 million candle spot light and shone it at the black out stars area.  wow was i surprised to see a triangle shaped craft dull gray. the front was thinner and curved to a wider back. it moved very slowly from west to east.  i kept the light on the craft for approximately 3 minutes. then it started a smooth slow turn to the southeast. it stayed away from the city light glow and stayed in the darker areas.  i was losing sight of the object and weny into the house to get binoculars.  i went out on the top deck and searched but could no longer see it. the object made no sound.At any time. i live 10 to 20 miles from two airports. i saw one small airplane before and two small airplanes after i saw the object. i had horrible nightmares that night!
content.summary: Triangle thinner near the front

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a delivery for a restaurant i work for, and stopped at the customers house, who ordered the food. upon getting ready to exit my vehicle, i observed an orange orb in the sky. it was cloudy that night, and no stars could be seen. i got out of my vehicle, and saw another orange orb light up in the sky. i called my customers' out to come and see. we all watched a total of 4 of these orange orbs in the sky. i returned to the restaurant, and was telling my co-workers about it. as i was telling one my co-workers, another orange orb appeared in approximately the same area as before. both of us witnessed this orange orb. the objects were decending in a south westerly direction--glowing bright and fading out with no tail, moving rather slowly.

this is not the first time i have witnesses these orange orbs. myself and a group of approximately 8 other people witnessed them on new years eve 2013--just after midnight. i did some research and found they were seen all over the world that night. the objects on this occation were ascending in a north easterly direction.

pretty cool stuff. peace :d
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 5 orange orbs seen over northern california coast

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving early in morning to go to my oldest daughters, she was going to have my 2nd grandchild. so i was driving on back roads to get to main highway since i live in the country. it was about 0430 in the morning when i observed a round large glowing light orange/white in color with blinking lights. there was an airplane flying much higher past the object, i was able to use it as a comparison to see that it wasn't an airplane, it looked nothing like the plane. while watching i then observed a smaller object/craft of the same color drop out of the larger object. it stopped just above the tree tops. both objects just hovered in the area they were first seen. then they both disappeared, i called my mother to tell her, she was up because she was seeing us off. my youngest daughter was with me during this time. i was definatly anxious and conflicted, i wanted to get as far away as possible but at the same time i wanted to watch.When i was on the phone with my mother the large main object appeared again without the secondary craft, it was only there briefly then it disappeared for good. i always watch the skys because approx. 3 yrs earlier my oldest daughter her fianc��� and i witnessed another ufo and took pics however my youngest daughter was using my digital camera and erased them needless to say i was pretty upset. the ufo i am reporting now was in the same area in the sky as the one we saw 3 yrs earlier.
content.summary: Large orange/white ball about 3to 4 football fields in sky,after observing for 2 mins a smaller same color craft came out. went straight down just above tee top and hovered then they both disappeared. i have more info but not enough space here to share it

content.detailedDescription:
At 3:30am on april 9th 2013.. i glanced out the window and noticed the sky was glowing south of me. it pulsed orange in color like flames, either inside the clouds or under. it was extremely intense, and did it in a huge part of the southern sky. 
my first impression was ashland oil company off raff road in canton was exploding or something, i almost called 911 to report it but decided to not to. 
no noise, or sirens, i also thought it could have been big house fire, or warehouse fire lighting up the sky. thinking of fire, i got my police scanner out and scanned through, but the radio activity was totally dead, except for an ambulance saying it was arriving at mercy medical center.
the sky after about 10 minutes, slowly dimmed within seconds, and it was gone.
i searched the canton repository for reports of a fire, and even called them, but no information was given on anything like that happening.
whatever it was, if it was a fire that big, would have to have been reported, like i stated, i thought an oil company was exploding.
my only other guess was it was something above the clouds pulsing an orange light.. but it would have to of been stationary. i don't know how long it was in the sky before i seen it, but it lasted 10 minutes when i spotted it.
content.summary: Intense glowing from the sky, from above the clouds maybe.

content.detailedDescription: I have watched this object go over my house three times. the same direction and same lights blinking. no sound. i am awake until it goes over then i can sleep.
content.summary: Watched it go over my house three nights.

content.detailedDescription: Standing on back patio looking up towards north west, seaching sky  w/binoculas for pan starrs comet, silient light move overhead , light inconsistant  with  airplane. air plane  also flying by w/sound clearly its a plane the ufo still silent . ufo light is yellow no other lights on object. did not have any other lights , red or blinking blue, just a  star like light moving over head. did not have any tools or camera available, went inside house and got my slr digal camera, took 1 photo, camera was on auto can could not focus , i knew this was my second ufo, i felt elated, i even waved and said hello. i knew this was not a plane or chopper.
content.summary: Silient yellow light without any sound sw to nw.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Went outside with mother while she smoked cigarette and the hugest red lights looking as if they were almost on fire appeared directly above and ho ered over us we bolted inside and went to look out the window but couldn't see it we went back out seconds later to watch it and there were people directly across the street from us staring into the sky as well shocked at the lights  my main concern was is this bombs flying over us? is this a ufo? is this huge thing going to hit is? when we went back out it was gone,and it must have been gone when we were insid strying to look for it thru the windows as well but it was very high in the sky..Yet looked huge still just sat there...2 separate huge red lights with almost fiery looking edges
content.summary: 2 giant red fire like lights hover in the sky directly above people line outside staining at the sky

content.detailedDescription: It was around 7:00am, i had just opened the patio door curtains and sat on the couch to look at my e-mails. less than 5 minutes after i had just settled down i saw bright lights moving in a strange v pattern caught my eye. i work in the airline industry and i know what an airplane moves like, and this was unlike anything i ever saw. i got up and went directly to the glass patio door and noticed that there were at least 5+ of these light orbs flying across the sky (below the dark day break clouds) at first they all were flying in the v formation to the left but then their pattern changed! they went in every direction possible, left right, up down...At that point i got very nervous....7:00 am above mississauga ontario, when most people are awake ? it felt uneasy to me..I decided that i could not be alone to witness this so i darted to the bedroom to wake up my fiance. but by the time he got to me most of them had already went up into the clouds. he only managed to get a glimpse of the last one ascending up into the sky.
content.summary: 5+ bright orbs flying in a v pattern, then split up to fly in opposite directions and at crazy spead,  over mississauga ontario

content.detailedDescription: This is not much of a sighting compared to others,but i was taking my two dogs out for there last well what dogs do in the yard at 11:52pm and as soon as i stepped on the runway part of my deck i saw the white round light .Not sure of the size but big enough.Maybe as big as a compact car? so as usual when i have seen one ,i will shine my four d battery mag light at it and start messing with them,most of the time they will do something ive seen them like power down,its like turning a coleman lantern down real fast you can still see the craft,i used to think all this was cool until last fall!!!! anyway he was over an old strip mine and when i started putting my light and the laser from my glock almost instantly a smaller red one came from out of the north ,and just stayed in one place ,like checking me out the white one kept looking around and went over out of my sight.My dogs wer finished and with the red one still about500 feet over the mountain ,i just came on in my house!I've seen round ones one shaped like a thumbnail and i had a very very close up encounter with one that was shaped like arectangle jewel!!! u can laugh or think i am a nutcase!!When it happens to you see how hard you laugh then !!!! they are here don't kidd yourself and pretend they aren't.I could type a 2500 word essay but it wont do any good i have called mufon before about 3 yrs ago and never recieved a call back , i thought i would reach out one more time!!! the ball is in your court!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
content.summary: This is just the latest unmistakable sighting ! there were two one white and one red round shaped this time . no i am not crazy even though it makes you feel like it at times ! in the last 3 years my family and i have had numerous sightings!Call me!!!!!!!

content.detailedDescription: Watching sky while smoking. liv in lake tahoe and obsevered a white flashing light every 40- 50 seconds flash once. not a jumbo jet or heli because it is at least 40,000+ in the sky, maybe even in earth space orbit. i know that airliners have to have a becon light while flying over tahoe, but this light was stationary. i watched this for aout 5 minutes and then came inside to report this sighting. i just went out to see if it is still there and it is not. also i see the space station from time to time pass by but this just sat there.
content.summary: Bright flashing light every 45 seconds above lake tahoe, ca. lasted about 5 mins.

content.detailedDescription: Outside at four in the morning and smoking a cigarette, i saw a bright white light in the direction i was looking (south) followed by a chest shaking bang or boom... almost like the world's loudest gunshot times much more. called the police over it and was informed that it was likely a transformer though their computers showed no outages. i looked into this type of event and found that it falls under the category of mystery boom. the closest event i can direct people to that's similar to what i saw is a video from surveillance taken in salem, massachusetts, albeit i was much further away... the video seems to be very close to the boom. i was several miles but it was very loud and the sound took no time to get to me. i didn't see any reports about this in the area, but i've seen many across the country and feel it should be considered ufo phenomenon. add west palm beach, florida to the list of places that have experienced a boom. at the time of this posting, more odd events occurred with well known friends in the area. though this was worth reporting.
content.summary: Bright white light followed by the loudest boom/bang i've ever heard in the distance to the south. a mystery boom.

content.detailedDescription:
In october 2004 at approximately 3:30 a.M. i awoke outside of my house in my back yard. when i awoke, i was unaware of where i was or what was happening. after a few seconds, i realized i was outside of my house and the window was open. i hurriedly reentered the house through the window and spent the rest of the night in an uneasy slumber.

i wanted to make a note of this event because i have never had any past experiences with 'sleep walking', even for short distances. i also have never had any experiences with ufo sightings (and i grew up and live in the country where star gazing and night viewing was an everyday occurrence) so i don't believe in them, however, this incident was beyond 'strange' for me as nothing like this has ever happen like this before or since then.

i have no recollection of the event whatsoever.
content.summary: Not certain why i woke up outside.

content.detailedDescription:
La evidencia mas importante que grabe en v���deo es un huevo tipo hamburguesa, donde se ve que emite un rayo (flash de c���mara)super-n���tido (9 minutos de duraci���n aprox.), y tengo cinco mas que grabe durante los ���ltimos 10 a���os entre otras fotos hd algunas se las adjunto en este informe, mi inter���s es que les hagan los an���lisis pertinentes y solo demostrar que son reales, por su atenci���n gracias.

pd. una disculpa david cuando hablamos yo no se hablar ingles pero las evidencias que tengo no necesitan interpretaci���n, saludos cordiales. 

si este informe no fue llenado correctamente cuando vean los v���deos responder���n cualquier cuestionamiento.
content.summary: En verdad son increíbles no he visto algo igual, bajo protesta de decir la verdad.

content.detailedDescription: My son was taking pictures of a flock of birds and in the picture he took he noticed 2 auras of light, in the bottom aura you can see a spheer and on the aura on top you can almost see another spheer. he did not see object until he checked his pictures. he sent me the picture to see what i thought it could be. didn't check pictures until he got home so he never looked to see the objects with his eyes.
content.summary: Photographing birds and caught picture of u.F.O.

content.detailedDescription:
This happened when i was about 7 years old when my family lived in an apartment complex in utah.It was in between the late summer or early fall, and i was at a birthday slumber party for one of my girlfriends. all the girls, including a few parents, slept out on the tennis court. as we all settled down and looked up at the clear sky full of stars, we suddenly seen what we thought was a shooting star, only it didn't shoot down towards earth like stars normally do...It kind of did a squiggly move and it went so fast that it had a tail of light from the speed? in a funny way i can tell you it looked and moved like human sperm would? 
then two more appeared and were moving the same way and all were about the same size. they would shoot off then come back in straight lines, but then they will move in a squiggly pattern off an on, as if they are playing or showing off? 
after about ten minutes they flew off and never came back. everyone that was awake during that slumber party on the tennis court witnessed this event. i thought i would see posts or sightings reported by now, but apparently i couldn't find anything? and this happened when i was still only a child and i am in my 30's now. 
i did suffer a traumatic event as a child, but shortly after this occurred. so this means i can say that i don't think my mental health has anything to do with it. i actually forgot about it until a year of two ago.
content.summary: Three lights flying sporadically for roughly 10 minutes, then disappear in a blink of an eye.

content.detailedDescription:
1 driving my car
2 light under a cloud
3 bizar
4 i saw light dissapering whyle i was looking after 3 min
5 i was happy that i whas seeing 1 so good i was driving whit my car en stopt direct en watched for three minutes
6 dissapeart


7 i dont got a video or a photo. because i don't had my cellphone or camera whit me at that time. but i got something, it's another bizar video i dont know what it is. maybe you know. 
two things at one video. first a weird cloud, and second a black stripe out of space. in the future i'll never forget my camera again for the lights
content.summary: Ufo dissapearing whyle i was looking

content.detailedDescription: I was getting into vehicle to go out to eat. my children and i were watching the sky because we noticed helicopter activity. my daughter thought they were military copters. we looked to the north sky and saw two rows of orange lights. they were hanging in the air low; just above trees about a mile away. they lights seemed to keep a semi-straight row per row. i had to go to another location three minutes down the road and when we arrived, we couldn't see the lights anymore. there was a lot of helicopter activity that night. when i saw the lights, i did not feel anything but wonder. i could not figure out what i saw.
content.summary: Two rows of orange balls light 1 over other. hovered low in north sky. 8 to 12 lights. two helicopters in area as well.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was driving home after dropping off my boyfriend at work.  i decided to take a photo of the surrounding landscape while on an on-ramp to the 99-north highway just because i thought it looked nice and there was no traffic around me which helped to form a good opportunity to take a photo.
2. i did not physically see the object when the photo was taken-- i had no idea that i was going to be capturing a photo of a ufo.  i only noticed the object after looking over the photos i took when i got home.  i noticed the object in the first photo i took but not in any of the others.
3.  i initially thought that the object may have been a smudge on the windshield but i was not able to find anything on my windshield that resembled the object shown in the photo.
4.  since i did not actually see the object, i don't know what its actions were.  however, the picture shows some sort of shape that i'm not exactly sure how to describe.  it is colored darkly and is not shiny as far as i can tell. 
5.  during and after the photo was taken, i felt gleeful and glad to be in the scenario that i was in.
6.  i did not ever have sight of the object.
content.summary: Ufo found in cell phone photo taken; ufo not seen with eyes but appears in photo

content.detailedDescription: My family and.I were sitting out back we saw orange balls of lights coming off the mountains east of lk havasu city they were heading towards phoenix. then after a few mins no more all to gather about 7 of them.Then we thought it was over we went and sat down and talk it over what we have seen.Then.I look up and over the edge of the roof there they were 5 of them the size of a cigarette pack with ice blue and white lights moving back and forth under the crafts.One of them was over my head stop and went straight up and turn into a star.The others move slowly to the south.There were two others to my left that became one.Has.I look closer.I saw an energy feel the stars were magnified thought it.As they move far there south they stop and move with the stars all night.If you came out of the house you would not have know they were there if you were not here when they came over the house.
content.summary: Whow !

content.detailedDescription:
It was a clear night for sky watching and i was in the back yard, as i often do, checking objects in the sky. i had been outside since sunset. this incident occurred at 9:53pm. at the time i was following a high flying jet(facing the west)when these 4 definite oval shaped objects crossed my line of sight from left to right. they were traveling in a 'v' formation, equally spaced apart as indicated on the rough sketch i have supplied, going from due north to due south. they were not very bright but bright enough to see their shapes. initially i considered them to be geese but they were too high and their formation was too rigid, so i discarded that idea. they moved very fast in a straight line across the sky. much faster than any geese i have personally observed. the entire sighting only lasted no more than 10 seconds(from horizon to horizon). having had 2 prior observations (1 report filed) of multiple objects traveling together i know these were not any conventional air crafts. having seen many pictures & videos of ufos, i would consider these to be ufos. this was the first time that i have observed 4 objects, in formation, at the same time. the objects continued north and i lost sight of them in the distance. just for the record, about 5 minutes after the initial sighting another object was seen (by me)by itself, traveling in the same direction. i only wish that someone else had witnessed what i saw tonight. had others seen this they would really reconsider what they feel about ufos...And their existence in our sky.
at the time i was using high powered star watching binoculars. specifically they are zhumell 20 x 80 power binoculars, so i got a better than average view.
content.summary: While watching night sky 4 objects crossed my line of sight at high speed.

content.detailedDescription: We were outside on our deck around 9:20 pm. we were looking at the stars like we do quite often. we looked over to the south and saw a bright white light moving straight north. when it got about right east of us, it abruptly changed directions, and started heading towards an orange light that was stationary that we just noticed at that moment. the white light faded out, and at the same moment, the orange light started moving strait up very, very slowly. then it changed directions and was moving up and to the north. then, it stopped for about 30 seconds, then started moving north again. then, this light disappeared abruptly also. it was absolutely calm at the time, and there was no sound at all being produced. there was also no clouds in the sky at all for the lights to disappear behind.
content.summary: We saw a bright white light and an orange bright light. neither made any sound and both faded out abruptly with no clouds in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Camping on the edge of the shawnee myself and two others observed a very bright, silent aircraft move across the sky. very similar to the sighting others have reported of the "star like" craft that is spotted often in this area. it moved at a quick speed and was fairly close to the ground. moved from west to east and vanished. no cloud cover. from what we observed, there were three very bright white lights and looked like a black triangle from a side angle.
content.summary: Completely silent, very bright star like object moved from the west to the east very quickly.

content.detailedDescription: driving with my dad from work we saw what it looks like a blimp, but blimps have tail wings and this object it did't also there was a white strobing light undernead the object ,we spoted the object when clouds move to the east uncovering the object,i manage to take the shot with my i phone but as we went down the road the clouds cover it again,that day was cloudy and we have a little bit os snow early morning, we live in doylestown ohio and we have other cooworkers live in doylestown also,the most weird about this is that everyone who live i a 10 miles radius from the sighting got sick with diarreah,vomiting and  fever,i read that most of time after a ufo sightings people get sick with common simptoms like this, thats is all i have to say. thank you.
content.summary: Blimp shape with white strobe light and two spheres in each side undernead the ufo

content.detailedDescription: Standing in the front of the house as my father was leaving from a visit.  we both noticed the object about the same time and stated "what is that?".  i look to the night sky often and familiar with most activity in our area.  this was not a normal sighting.  typically i would have chalked it up as a plane, however this did not have the characteristics with respect to the orange glow and lack of sound.  it moved from the east toward the west at what seemed to be a normal flight speed.  the oddity was the large glow aspect giving the object a round shape.  when i realized it was something unusual, i called out to my son to bring his camera.  we attempted some shots, not the best, but we weren't expecting to see something.  we watched it for about 3 minutes and then it was no longer in our sight.
content.summary: Standing outside when a orange sphere glides over us and vanishes
